articles.title: Are Nkunku and Loftus the ones who give the most guarantees? Allegri: "We'll see it at the end of the match..."
articles.summary:
Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN before Pisa-Milan.

Pulisic, Leao and Fullkrug on the bench... Do Nkunku and Loftus give more guarantees?

“We'll see if they're better and give more guarantees after the match (laughs, ed.).

articles.title: LIVE MN - Pisa-Milan (0-1): cross from Athekame, goal from Loftus-Cheek! Milan unlocks it
articles.summary: 39' | GOOOOOOOOOLLLLLL THE MILAAAAAAAAAAAN! Modric's opening for Athekame who moves it to the right and crosses for Loftus-Cheek's header to make it 0-1 for the Rossoneri.

articles.title: PIS-MIL (0-1): Loftus unlocks it! Great cross from Athekame
articles.summary: MILAN GOAL! Loftus-Cheek unlocks Pisa-Milan in the 39th minute with a great header! The Englishman's first entry into the area and the Rossoneri's goal arrives.

articles.title: Allegri: "Inter? We just need to score as many points as possible, first and foremost for our objective which is the Champions League"
articles.summary:
Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN before Pisa-Milan. 

Do you want to reach the derby with 5 points behind you?

“I believe there is very little that can be done.

articles.title: Allegri shakes Fofana: "Wake up, you've touched a ball so far!". And send Ricci to warm up
articles.summary: After the outburst with Loftus-Cheek Allegri also went to pick up Fofana, who in these first 25 minutes of Pisa-Milan often lost the ball while managing it.

articles.title: Pisa-Milan, Allegri furious with Loftus-Cheek: "He's walking!"
articles.summary: Not an easy start to the match for Milan in Pisa. Hiljemark's team is closing very well in this start to the match and Milan's pace doesn't help: the Rossoneri's maneuver is slow and predictable.

articles.title: Bazzani: "Having those two arrows there, Pulisic and Leao, to put into the ongoing match is an added value"
articles.summary: Milan goes to Pisa with Pulisic and Leao starting from the bench, with Allegri starting Loftus and Nkunku in attack from the first minute.

articles.title: Compagnoni: "If two months ago someone had said Nkunku-Loftus couple, they would have told him to put the fiasco down"
articles.summary: Today, Milan takes the field in Pisa ten days after their last match in Serie A Enilive.

articles.title: Marcolin: "Athekame is growing, thanks to Allegri who gets into the head"
articles.summary: Thanks to Saelemaekers' injury, Zachary Athekame is also a starter this evening in Pisa-Milan. The Swiss scored the first and only goal in the Rossoneri shirt in the first leg for the final 2-2.

articles.title: Allegri to DAZN: "In doubt right up to the end whether to let Leao play. Complicated match tonight"
articles.summary:
Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN before Pisa-Milan. All his statements:

Do you want to reach the derby with 5 points behind you?

“I believe there is very little that can be done.

articles.title: Pisa-Milan, no surprises about the captain. Cage the deputy
articles.summary: No surprise, Milan's captain for the match against Pisa is Mike Maignan. The deputy, with Leao starting on the bench, is Matteo Gabbia.

articles.title: Athekame to MTV: "Replacing Saelemaekers is not easy, but there are several players who are ready"
articles.summary: Zacahary Athekame, AC Milan defender, spoke to MilanTV before Pisa-Milan: "The team is doing well. The match will be difficult, but we are ready.

articles.title: Pisa, Hiljemark: "Milan are a strong team, also in terms of individuality and as a coach. But there is room for them to be hurt"
articles.summary:
Oscar Hiljemark, Pisa coach, spoke to DAZN before this evening's match against Milan. His words:

Did you remember the brace against Milan?

“Yes, but it was from many years ago.

articles.title: Bazzani: "I believe that Milan must look at their path, without having the anxiety of having to shorten Inter"
articles.summary:
Fabio Bazzani, in the pre-match of Pisa-Milan on DAZN, talks about the Rossoneri's ranking and the championship fight with Inter, currently at +8. His words:

"Winning today would shorten the standings.

articles.title: Pisa, Moreo: "Hiljemark conveyed great desire to everyone"
articles.summary:
Stefano Moreo, Pisa striker, spoke to DAZN before the match against Milan. These are his statements:

Do you play as a first striker?

“No, I play downstairs.

articles.title: Athekame still starting: "I'm happy and focused"
articles.summary:
Zachary Athekame, today the starter, spoke to DAZN before the Pisa-Milan match.

In the first leg you scored your first and only goal against Milan, did you think about it?

“Yes yes, it was a great emotion”.

articles.title: Pisa-Milan: referee team and where to watch the match
articles.summary:
PISA-MILAN, THE REFEREE TEAM
Referee: FABBRI
Assistants: IMPERIALE – PASSERI
Fourth man: PICCININI
VAR: AURELIANO
AVAR: GREENHOUSE

WHERE TO SEE PISA-MILAN
Date: Friday 13 February 2026
Time: 8pm.

articles.title: Rabiot, top performance: no one like him in away games
articles.summary: Here we are! Pisa-Milan is getting closer and closer, a match scheduled for this evening at 8.45pm and valid for the 25th matchday of the championship.

articles.title: Referees union at FIGC and NLD: "Reopen the discussion on safety"
articles.summary: (ANSA) - ROME, FEBRUARY 13 - "Let us resume with determination the process of discussion already fruitfully started, aimed at providing concrete and structural responses to trade union demands, especially regarding safety and protection for workers...

articles.title: Pisa-Milan, the official lineups: Allegri again with the Nkunku-Loftus pair
articles.summary:
These are the official lineups for Pisa-Milan, a match valid for the twenty-fifth matchday of Serie A.

PISA (3-4-2-1): Nicolas; Canestrelli, Caracciolo, Božhinov; Touré, Aebischer, Loyola, Angori; Tramoni, Stojilković; Moreo.
